about_the_game:
Add some new female fighters to your party’s roster with the RPG Character Pack 9! Gee-kun-soft’s latest character pack is here with 16 new female characters who are ready to rumble! Add a powerful redheaded wizard to your party to help your sword-wielding main character defeat new enemies, or let your players choose to play as a spunky twin-tailed adventurer when they start the game! Form a team with a lavender-haired fox girl fighter, a young warrior elf who wields a huge ax, and a dress-wearing mage to take on the demon lord, and let the pack’s other warriors and wizards act as NPCs who can teach your players new skills.

Each character comes with a MZ-style sprite and sv battler that are ready for battle, along with downed sprites so you can portray them as sleeping or wounded after a surprise attack. 8 different emotions fill their facesets so you can show them smiling when given a gift or upset after an especially challenging fight. And not only that, but each emotion is also shown on 8 bust images just in case your game doesn’t use smaller face images. But what if your game uses front-view enemies for battles and you want your players to battle the pink-haired archer after she reveals that she’s working for the demon lord? Don’t worry, since each character has 13 enemy images that include different emotions and recolors!

This pack also includes bonus high-res, full body art of each character so you can resize them to perfectly fit your game or appear in a codex so your players can read up on any characters that they’re interested in. If you’ve been searching for some interesting art to match your warrior or spellcaster characters or want to add memorable NPCs, check out the RPG Character Pack 9 today!

Features:

* battlers with 16 variants each / busts and facesets with 8 emotions each
* SV-animated battlers, walking sprites and bonus portraits

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
